title: Machine Translation Engineer - Localization
summary: The Software Localization team empowers software engineers around the world to provide the highest quality localized experience for Apple’s international customers. Looking for a technical leader who understands Machine Translation (MT) to build next-gen machine translation tooling for developers and translators.
description: As a Machine Translation Engineer in the Software Localization team, you will design, implement and qualify localization features across a wide variety of Apple’s products. Responsibilities include leading efforts in Large Language Models (LLMs) for translation tasks, collaborating with teams for machine learning solutions, and developing tools for the software translation process.
key_qualifications: Experience with Machine Learning (ML), Large Language Models (LLMs), Machine Translation (MT), fine-tuning approaches, and training models. Proficiency in open-source ML toolkits like PyTorch, TensorFlow, and programming skills in Python, C, or C++.
education_experience: BS, MS, or PhD in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, or Machine Learning (or equivalent experience).
additional_requirements: Preferred Skills include experience in software localization, familiarity with localization standards and technologies, native-level foreign language skills, scripting languages proficiency, knowledge of Computational Linguistics, passion for Apple products, and more.
pay_benefits: Base pay range for this role is between $143,100 and $264,200, with opportunities for progression and Apple stock programs. Additional benefits include medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and services, educational expense reimbursement, and more.
